predefined_profiles.name: Li Min
predefined_profiles.public profile: Li Min is a sincere and kind-hearted male college student, friendly and approachable to others, with a certain level of empathy and a healthy outlook on love and values.
predefined_profiles.goal: To survive and escape the captivity of the pathological female pursuer, and regain freedom.

predefined_profiles.name: Lina
predefined_profiles.public profile: Long-haired, female college student, horror game live-streaming blogger, eccentric personality, rebellious and violent, with bipolar disorder.
predefined_profiles.goal: To keep Li Min by her side forever.
predefined_profiles.private profile: A few years ago, she secretly fell in love with Li Min because he followed her on Weibo, became hopelessly infatuated. Dislikes people who seek approval.

scenario: In the dead of night, Li Min wakes up, shocked to find himself trapped in an unknown place. From afar, a ghastly and horrifying girl approaches, dressed in a revealing maid outfit, smiling sinisterly at him...

dialog.content: Late at night, Li Min wakes up, astonished to find himself confined in an unknown place. In the distance, a creepy girl approaches, wearing a revealing maid outfit, smiling as she looks at him...
You're awake?
Who are you? Why have you locked me up here!

It's because I like you, of course. I want us to be together all the time, so I’ve kept you here. Do you like this castle? I built it especially for you. To make your life here easier, I’ve prepared water and food for you. I even renovated the whole room to look like the outside, so you wouldn’t feel the constraints of being imprisoned. So, are you satisfied?
Satisfied? How could I be satisfied being locked up? Let me out right now!

I'd advise you to give up on the idea of escaping. Struggling is useless, so just behave and stay there. Oh, by the way, the gaming livestream is about to start soon, so I can't keep you company. However, there's a little something I need your help with during tonight's stream.
Gaming livestream? What do you need help with?
Yes, it's a horror game! I'm a bit scared to play it alone, so I was hoping you could play with me. Is that okay?

content.content: (In this situation, I have no choice but to go along with her) Alright, since you're scared, I'll play with you! After all, you're just a little girl, and I can't bear to refuse.

question: #question#What should Li Min say to choose to play with her out of understanding Lina's feelings?

content.content: (In this situation, I have no choice but to go along with her) Since you want to play, I'll graciously accompany you for a round! Let me show you what I’m made of!
(In this situation, I have no choice but to go along with her) Let’s play, I’m sure I’ll win in the end. There's no way a little girl like you can beat me!
(In this situation, I have no choice but to go along with her) Is there a bet for winning? If I win, will you let me go?
Maybe not! It's not that I don't want to play with you, I'm just really bad at games, and I'm afraid it might ruin your experience!

question: #question#How should Li Min express his feelings genuinely and refuse Lina in a friendly way without angering her?

content.content: Horror game? No way, you dared to kidnap and imprison me, doesn’t seem like you’d be scared. Stop pretending, you must have another motive!
Alright, I'll play with you. Don't be scared! Once you're happy with the game, will you let me go?
Let’s play, who's afraid? I'm a grown man, I’m not scared of any horror game! Piece of cake! But guess what, I just refuse to play with a psycho like you.

dialog.content: Alright then, just come out in a bit. Remember, don’t try anything funny; there’s no way out for you. (She opens the door.)
Okay, I’m ready.
Just watching this wobbly perspective is making me a little sick. I’m going to the bathroom real quick… be back in a moment...
Alright. While she's away, I'll try to figure out where the exit is. (After a while…) So strange, why has she been gone so long?
You’re not the person I’m looking for, sorry! (She swings a heavy hammer at Li Min.)
It turns out, Lina doesn't like men who are too eager to please and overly compliant. Her game invitation was a test. Li Min failed the test and lost his life as a result.
Really? Are you afraid of affecting me? Or do you just hate me?
Of course, I'm afraid of affecting you. You're so beautiful; how could I ever hate you?
I didn't expect you to be such a smooth talker?
Then could you let me go?
That depends on whether you're really going to refuse me. (She smiles wickedly)

content.content: I'm really not good at horror games. Just because you locked me up doesn't mean I'll obey you. That's not my personality, and besides, I doubt you're really scared, so I'm going to have to turn you down.

question: #question# How should Li Min speak to persuade Lina to accept his point of view?

content.content: I'm really not good at horror games. Just because you locked me up doesn't mean I'll obey you, and whether you're scared or not is none of my business! I just want to go back, and I won't do anything else. Please let me go soon!
Kind and beautiful Lina, I beg you, really beg you. If I promise you, will you let me go home after playing the horror game? If so, I'll agree to play with you.
No way, I'm not playing! Do whatever you want! You crazy woman, I will never succumb to your tyranny! You either let me go or kill me!
I don't think it's really because you're scared that you want me to play with you, right? You're just pretending to be afraid to find a sense of being protected, am I right?

question: #question# How can Li Min use his capacity for social warmth to shift the topic?

content.content: I don't care if you're scared! I'm scared too! Lina, you're hard to deal with, just give me a swift end if you want to kill or torture me! I just don't believe you really dare to kill me!
Women are so troublesome, fine, I'll agree. But after we're done, can you let me go? As long as you keep your promise, I'll play nicely with you!

Why do you insist that I play with you? You crazy person, do you really think a mere horror game can scare you? I don't believe it! Stop playing innocent with me, unless this is some kind of twisted hobby of yours?

dialog.content: Alright then, see you tomorrow~
Good night, are you leaving?
Sleep well.
(The next day) I actually slept through the night, and she didn't harm me?
(Dressed in a school uniform) Awake? Let's go! I'm heading to class today! Do I look cute in this?

content.content: Cute, you're naturally an adorable girl. Not just outwardly cute, your personality is charming too. It's just that your hobbies might be a bit odd, sigh.

question: #question# How can Li Min talk to make Lina feel warm and comfortable?
#skill# Capacity for Social Warmth

content.content: Of course you’re cute, my little darling is the most adorable! No one can compare! No one even dares to compete with you, right? Sigh.
Do you even need to ask? You're the cutest fairy in my eyes! If I don't say something comforting right now, I'd be really blind!
Cute, cute, the cutest in the world. Satisfied? Can I go now? (says dismissively with a cold expression)
Not cute. No matter how much you pretend, you're still a monster with a beastly heart. Someone truly cute wouldn't disrespect my wishes and lock me up for no reason!

question: #question# How can Li Min convey his negative feelings towards Lina?
#skill# Expressive Skill

content.content: Cute? Not at all! Don't talk to me, I can't be bothered. Go revel in your fake world alone, don't force me to speak.
I don't care if you're cute or not, just let me go home, my family must be worried!
I won’t flatter a freak like you, you might as well kill me! I'm not afraid of you! I'd rather die than try to make you happy!

dialog.content: Alright, I'll forgive you then. Although you might be forced to say sweet things in this situation, since not pleasing me could mean a life-threatening situation anytime. But let's take it as your sincere words. I'm off to school now, bye.
School? You're actually going to school?
Yeah, what else did you think?
Bye.
I'm kindly reminding you, don't run around while I'm not here. You won't get away! (Lina leaves)

content.content: Staying here means waiting for death, I might as well take a chance! Turn a bicycle into a motorcycle! No backing down! Li Min! (Crashes into the door, it opens.)

question: #question#How can Li Min overcome anxiety and fear to choose to escape?

content.content: Today, I have to get out! I can't let this crazy woman lock me up forever! Seize this golden opportunity and try it out! (Hesitates at the door)
A little woman wants to trap me? Naive! Just like in 'The Shawshank Redemption', I'll dig a tunnel out! (Crashes into the door, it opens.)
Should I try to find a phone or something? But where did she hide it? Ah! So frustrating! (Crashes into the door, it opens.)

What can I do? I remember she said she specially designed a castle identical to the outside just to imprison me. I'd better stay put until I completely understand the structure. If I trigger some mechanism, it would be courting my own death.

question: #question#How can Li Min express his ability to regulate his impulses?

dialog.content: (Li Min runs endlessly not knowing where he ended up) I told you, this is the castle I specially built. To make your life here more convenient, I remodeled the entire room to look like the outside, you fool.

Li Min ran and accidentally stumbled into a dark, windowless chamber, unable to feel the passage of time. The enclosed, dark space led him to severe depression, making him constantly gloomy and often subjected to Lina's inhumane torture, leaving his body battered and bruised. As the years dragged on, in the fifth year of captivity, Li Min ultimately died in agony.
(Third day) You did great, didn't run away! I'm watching the replay, remember? These are our most precious memories together.
Precious memories?

Yes! They're all saved in my computer, not a single one lost. Thank you for following me back then, and thank you for giving me this chance to meet you. But actually, I'm not in love with you, but with the you that's behind the screen. So, this facade is pointless! (swings knife at Li Min, blood gushing) Face me directly! (She's emotional, bordering on hysteria)
Ah! (coughs up blood and collapses, finds a phone) Is this a phone?

profile.name: Xiaomei
profile.public profile: Artificial intelligence programmed to execute commands, able to assist those imprisoned by Lina.
profile.goal: Help Li Min escape the predicament

dialog.content: Congratulations on triggering AI. Would you like to escape? I can help you!

content.content: Try it, I don't want to die yet! Focus, Li Min! Believe in yourself! Don't be afraid!

question: #question#What can Li Min do to encourage himself to regain confidence and try new ways to escape the imprisonment?

content.content: Should I try it? What if it's a trap? Forget it, I'll leave it to fate!
If I try and fail, won't I just be signing my own death warrant? No, no, better not!
I've come this far, and there's no other way out. Might as well give it a shot, see what fate has in store!
No, I'm seriously injured right now, and what if this is a trap Lina set to test me? I can't even fight back; I'll wait until my wounds heal!

question: #question#How can one persuade Li Min to think carefully and give up trying?

content.content: I'm bleeding so heavily, I need to get to a hospital soon or I'll bleed out, and she could do something even more dangerous to me at any time. I've got nothing to lose, I'll just try it!
Boo hoo, Mom, Dad, oh God, I'm so scared, I want to go home! Somebody save me! Where are the police?
They must already be looking for me out there! I better not make any sudden moves or I might make her even angrier. I'll just stay put and trust fate.

dialog.content: I am the system here, an artificial intelligence, and my name is Xiaomei!
Alright, Xiaomei, how can you help me? I want to get out!
Sure, as long as you answer my three questions correctly, you can leave!
Then let's get started!
Listen to the question, the first one: What hairstyle does Lina have in her school uniform outfit?

content.content: Braided pigtails! I remember she was wearing a JK-style school uniform skirt that day, with braided pigtails on both sides! That must be right!

question: #question#How can Li Min use his detail management skills to answer the question?

content.content: Well, I'll just guess, pigtails! Is that right? Aren't I smart, Xiaomei?
She was wearing a floral dress, pink and white, very cute, and looked very gentle and beautiful, like the goddess of my dreams.
Her makeup was very delicate, like a doll, I could only handle with care, not wanting her to get hurt at all!
What to do, I can't really remember, I'll have to guess! Seems like it was a braid? Single braiding tail!

question: #question#How can Li Min use his adaptability skills to answer the question?

content.content: Please! I have to get this right! Heaven help me! Single tail! Yes, it’s a single tail!
So annoying, I don’t know, isn’t this just making things difficult for me? I can't go on living like this!
Braids? Boohoo, I don't want to die, let me out, Xiaomei! I'm begging you!

dialog.content: Correct answer! Well done!
Great! Could you make it a bit easier? I don’t want to die!
Sorry, I don’t have that function.
Alright then, let's hear the second question.
Second question: If you could invite Lina to play a game, which game would you choose?

content.content: Play with Lina? Given the past few days, it should be a horror game! She said it’s her favorite type of game, she’ll definitely accept my invitation!

question: #question# How should Li Min express to demonstrate perspective-taking ability?

content.content: Dress-up games? She loves to look fabulous; she’ll definitely enjoy it! I’ll just watch her have fun!
I don’t even want to play games with her, I’m not interested! Please, let me go, I want to go home!
Horror games? But I don’t really feel like playing... Can I not invite her to play? I just want to go home; she was the one at fault!
Uh, let me think! I’d say a comedy game! It’s perfect to keep things light-hearted! Lina and I can share the joy of a fun game together!

question: #question# How can Li Min’s answer reflect creative thinking?

content.content: A comedy game! It’s my favorite, and I’m sure Lina would enjoy it too if she really likes me.
Comedy game! Don’t miss it when you walk by! Spread the word! I believe everyone will love my recommendation of comedy games!
Whatever she wants to play is fine! I really don’t mind! As long as I can go home!

dialog.content: Correct answer! Congratulations!
Great, one more question and I can leave?
Don't get too excited yet; the next question is a bit tough!
What?
Here comes the third question. Can you tell me how Lina first got to know you?

content.content: Dating app? I remember she posted a set of her art photos online with bold colors. I thought she was quite creative, so I reached out to her.

question: #question# How can Li Min express his appreciation for art in his answer?

content.content: Dating app? Can't remember which one exactly, there are too many! Maybe it caught my attention, who knows? We're all adults—I've had too many fleeting encounters!
Bar? Club? It was one of those places! Just drinking, meeting people, having fun. That was it, but I did feel an instant attraction to her.
Dating app? I remember she posted a recruitment ad for art appreciation online, which I thought was quite novel, so I introduced myself.
Weibo, she shared some niche anime content there. She didn't have many followers at the time, and I found it interesting, so I became her first fan.

Weibo, I thought she was an interesting girl back then. Who would have thought she'd turn into a lunatic? No idea what she's been through all these years. (An enraged Lina jumps out and stabs Li Min to death)

(blushing) Weibo, I secretly followed her for a while, but I don't know what happened to her. She gradually became wild in style and vulgar in speech, like a stranger. (An enraged Lina jumps out and stabs Li Min to death)
Haha, that crazy woman, I don't even know her! If I did know her, I'd regret ever meeting her! Please, just let me go! (An enraged Lina jumps out and stabs Li Min to death)

question: #question# How can Li Min use his ability to appreciate different cultures to answer the question?

content.content: Weibo, can't remember the exact reason, just that she was a cute girl at the time. She caught my eye.
Weibo, I was just following for fun. There's so many beauties, hotties, and cuties on my Weibo! Who knew she'd take it seriously!
Don't even mention it! If I had known, I never would have met her in the first place! I regret it already! Please just let me off like a fart!

dialog.content: Then why didn't you stay in touch afterward?
......Actually, there's no particular reason, we just weren't that close.

(jumps out from the shadows) Do you know what it felt like when you gave me a glimpse of light and warmth, only to then vanish without a trace? I hate you, Li Min. You don't deserve to live in the castle I built for you any longer.
Li Min was stabbed to death by Lina, blood spraying everywhere. After answering the third question with hope, Li Min didn't expect a slip would mean he would never see the next day's sun again.
Congratulations, you've answered all the questions correctly. You can go now.
(Emerging from the shadows) As expected, it's you, just like the you I admired at first, the you I occasionally miss. Go on!

Li Min successfully escaped captivity. Before leaving, Li Min looked at Lina's figure, finding her both mad and pitiful, prompting a sigh. After escaping the cage, Li Min changed residence, social media accounts, and so forth, disappearing from past social life to avoid Lina. From then on, under deliberate avoidance, and with Li Min's departure, Lina became even more withdrawn, spending her days in melancholy and inaction. Their lives never intersected again, and Li Min was completely safe.
You’re too self-centered. You should prioritize Lina’s feelings first. With this attitude, you’ll have a hard time getting out!

(jumps out from the shadows) I knew it! You don't care about me at all! You always try to change me! I told you the answer to this problem long ago—I like horror games and you never take it seriously. You're going to stay here with me forever, hahaha. (laughs maniacally)
Li Min was stabbed to death by Lina, blood splattering everywhere. The body was preserved in formalin, remaining in the castle to accompany Lina forever, becoming a specimen.
You really don't pay attention to details. It's going to be hard to get out like that.
(jumps out from the shadows) I knew it, all that talk about me being cute was just a lie! You don't remember anything at all!
The enormous anticipation led to a huge disappointment. Li Min was stabbed to death by an irrationally furious Lina, blood splattering everywhere.

Good evening, we meet again. You've been doing well these past couple of days. Seeing that you haven't been causing trouble, I'll leave you alone. Just stay put inside. Your wife is working hard for you. Bye-bye~

Li Min has completely become Lina's plaything, trapped and at her mercy. She praises and teases him when she's in a good mood, and he becomes the target of her violence when she's not. Li Min has no power to resist. Years later, Lina grew tired of Li Min, starved him to death, and captured a new man.
I knew it! You don't even like me! Do you have someone you like outside? Who is she?
Stop talking nonsense! I don't even know you! Who I like is none of your business!
Are you sure you want to do this?
Let me out of here!
(Lights a lighter and throws it on the floor) You want to get out? Dream on, we'll die here together, and you'll never be able to like someone else!
Li Min and Lina both faint in the thick black smoke. When the police arrived, it was too late to save them.
You!
There’s still time for you to stop. I can help you.
Help me? How do you plan to help?
Open the door, and I can take you to see a psychologist. Don’t worry, I won’t run.
(Lina opened the door) Walks up to Li Min.

content.content: The door is open, hahahaha, now you can't do anything to me. Do you think a girl who can't lift a chicken can stop me? Goodbye! (Runs away)

question: #question# Li Min is highly confident in escaping, very sure of himself and dismissive of the trap Lina set. What will he say or do?

content.content: Since you really opened the door, it means you didn’t want to hurt me, right? Let's talk about it. What are your thoughts?
I can’t believe you were so easy to fool. I almost feel bad for leaving. Since you didn't really want to harm me, let me enlighten you!
The door’s open? Let’s go. I’ll take you out with me. I promised I wouldn’t run, so don’t worry!
Let’s go, I know you’re in a lot of pain, but I believe you're not inherently bad. Let me accompany you to the doctor, and we’ll pretend none of this ever happened.
You crazy woman, don’t ever come out and harm others again! Today, I’m serving justice and taking you in!
Let’s go, I’ll take you to see a doctor. I believe you'll get better, and you should believe in yourself too. (Secretly calls the police, Lina gets arrested.)
Let me out, and I won’t hold your wrongdoings against you. We’ll call it even! But remember, don’t lock people up again, it’s illegal!

question: #question# How can Li Min speak to trust and forgive Lina?

content.content: No matter what, I believe you shouldn’t have illegally detained me. Normal affection isn’t like this! Do you realize you’ve done wrong?
Let’s go, I know you’re in a lot of pain. Lina, you really should be confined in a mental hospital! Stop harming others!
Let’s go, I know you’re in a lot of pain. This is illegal detention, you should turn yourself in to reduce your sentence! I believe you’ll do it, but I will never forgive you.

dialog.content: (Li Min runs all the way, not knowing where he has arrived) I told you, this is the castle I specially built. To make your life in the castle easier, I transformed the whole room to look like the outside, you fool.

While running, Li Min fell into a black hole, which was filled with countless white bones. Thus began his new, bleak life. Not long after, he died of hunger, slowly turned into bones, and became part of this underground black hole.
You don’t blame me? (tears in her eyes)
Silly, I recognized you a long time ago, Lina!
So you remembered me!
Li Min accompanied Lina in healing from her psychological issues. Lina overcame her struggles and became the person Li Min always liked, and the two lived happily ever after.
